imdb.plot outline: MDR vor Ort-Team visits celebrations in Sachsen, Thüringen and discovers something special, experiences the unexpected and knows the people who make the event what it is - curious, bizarre and weird.
imdb.title: MDR vor Ort
plot: _MDR vor Ort_ (qv)-Team visits celebrations in Sachsen, Thüringen and discovers something special, experiences the unexpected and knows the people who make the event what it is - curious, bizarre and weird.
